data.name: Project New Horizon
data.detailed_description:
You wake up in your cryocapsule, which was supposed to happen before your ship arrives at a potential new home, a new planet for humanity to life on. But you are not in your ship, you are already on the ground, nobody else in sight. Stranded and surrounded by wrackpieces you start your journey in front of this new horizon.

The planet has breathable oxygen, which is good, because you would've been dead by the time you realised. Strangely it is already filled with plants and animals. What happend to the ship? How much years have passed since the arrival? But.. for now it doesn't matter, you need to survive and make this your new home!



Project New Horizon is a first person, open-world survival game with various islands to discover and explore. It is your decision where to go, what to do and what to build. But keep an eye on your stats and threatening wildlife!



Craft tools, harvest your surroundings, hunt for food and build your customized home!



Build yourself some ships to cross the sea and discover more islands!



Use all kinds of workstations with in-game interactions to process your materials.
data.about_the_game:

data.short_description: On the search for a new home your ship failed right before the arrival, now you are stranded on a planet surprisingly similar to earth. Discover the open world, hunt for food, build yourself a new homestead and survive!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 or newer, 64-bit
  • Processor: Dual Core Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 940
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 or newer, 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad Core Processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
